title: Gifting champions with IP

replies.body: Of course it's a great idea for us the players, but if it's one Riot would go for is a completely different matter. I imagine someone could start IP farming so they can "gift" at a conveniently undercut price compared to the in game store. If there were no checks in place to stop this from happening that would become a problem for them.
because i dont want to spent real money on games. so IP gifting champs is a good idea.
Great idea! I just wish we could gift hextech chests tho.
Means that if you have lots of IP you could just make a smurf with all the champions.
